definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: quan2 shen1 zhong1 du2 xing4 du2 ji4

definition: viral marketing/see also 病毒營銷|病毒营销[bing4 du2 ying2 xiao1]

sentences.english: Acute toxicity test, mutation test and single-cell gel electrophoresis(SCGE)were used.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解三氯乙醛的毒性和致突變作用。

sentences.english: The main cytotoxicity and mechanisms of fumonisin were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了伏馬菌素主要的細胞毒性作用及機制。

sentences.english: The experiment of acute poisonousness showed it was non-poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 急性毒性實驗顯示其無毒。

sentences.english: Objective To study the cytotoxicity of chitosan and its water soluble derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究殼聚糖及其水溶性衍生物的細胞毒性。

sentences.english: Corexit 9500 was found to be one of the most toxic dispersal agents ever developed.
sentences.chinese: 被發現是有史以來生產的最具毒性的分散劑之一。

sentences.english: From above, we can cue that cocaine has long toxicity effect on CNS.
sentences.chinese: 這提示可卡因的神經毒性作用具有長時程效應。

sentences.english: Humans have a much greater ability than rats for deactivating the potential toxicity of the substance.
sentences.chinese: 人類對潛在的毒性物質滅活能力比大鼠要強一些。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a test model for phototoxic agents with the method of chemiluminescence.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立化學發光法檢測藥物光毒性的模型。

sentences.english: It's quite similar to alcohol-dependent hepatotoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 這是非常相似，酒精依賴的肝毒性。

sentences.english: Patients receiving long-term ketoconazole should be monitored for hepatotoxicity .
sentences.chinese: 長期服用酮康唑的患者應監測該藥的肝臟毒性。

sentences.english: The material was found without pyrogen reaction and acute toxicity by the animal test.
sentences.chinese: 動物實驗發現材料不引起陽性熱源反應及急性毒性。

sentences.english: Undigested meat remaining in the intestines become putrified and leads to more toxic buildup.
sentences.chinese: 未消化的肉類留在腸內，會變成成毒性物質。

sentences.english: There was no immediate or delayed transplant-related toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 沒有發現立即和延遲性的移植相關毒性。

sentences.english: Objective To study toxicity of Stemona sessilifolia cream on the skin of animals.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究百部乳膏對動物皮膚的毒性作用。

sentences.english: They then monitored the cells for hyperoxia-induced toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 他們監測氧過多導致的細胞毒性。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the toxicity effects of aconitine on neonatal rat cardiomyocytes.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究烏頭鹼對乳鼠心肌細胞的毒性作用。

definition: to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
